Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi

Class ResourceEnvRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi.ResourceEnvRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Injectable
    public final class ResourceEnvRef
extends java.lang.Object
implements Injectable
    A reference to an administered object associated with a resource in the environment.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceEnvRef

        public ResourceEnvRef()

    • Method Detail

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
        Sets a description of this resource environment reference. Corresponds to the description element within resource-env-ref in the deployment descriptor.
        Parameters:
        description - a textual description of this reference
        See Also:
        Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.4: Resource Environment References

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of this resource environment reference. Corresponds to the resource-env-ref-name element in the deployment descriptor.

        The name is relative to the java:comp/env context.

        Parameters:
        name - the resource environment reference name
        See Also:
        Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.4: Resource Environment References

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName​(java.lang.String className)
        Sets the expected Java type of the referenced administered object. Corresponds to the resource-env-ref-type element in the deployment descriptor.

        This must be a fully-qualified class name of an administered object associated with a resource in the component's environment.

        Parameters:
        className - the fully-qualified class name of the administered object type
        See Also:
        Servlet 4.0 Specification, Section 14.4.4: Resource Environment References
